title: Special Police Dekaranger the Movie: Full Blast Action
description: A criminal gang called the Gas Drinkers have transformed Planet Lesley into a dead world. To fight them, the Leslian Dekaranger Mary lends her assistance to Earth's Special Police, the six Dekarangers, to fight for peace! Special Police Dekaranger The Movie: Full Blast Action finally hits the pages in manga form!
author: Yuusuke Takeyama
